name: Chaos Shell
description:
In Chaos Shell, a top-down shooter, you are in a constant struggle to maintain possession of the single weapon in the game: the Battle Ball. The Battle Ball will allow you to defeat your enemies, but without it you are powerless. Skilled players will find ways to use the Battle Ball to inflict the most damage possible, to as many enemies as possible. Chaos Shell features several characters, each with unique abilities which will affect the behaviour of the Battle Ball.

Chaos Shell has three game modes:
- Single-Player Campaign
- Multiplayer Mode
- Survival Mode

In the Single-Player Campaign, you will come up against a variety of enemies which require very different strategies to defeat. Destroy all the enemies in one level to progress to the next - this mode is about knowing your environment and using it to your advantage.

Multiplayer Mode is fast-paced, tactical, and skill-intensive. After selecting from the roster of unique characters, up to four players will fight for control of the Battle Ball. Wreck havoc on your opponents with your character's special abilities!

Survival Mode features procedural-generated levels, so it's new every time you play it. You'll need to defeat as many enemies as you can before you find yourself overwhelmed. This mode is difficult and will require the skill of an advanced player to master.
